ygData.subject: Re: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: The battle drum comes from the named gypsy musician in mistmoore castle.  a level 40 group has a chance of beating the room she s in or getting creamed. she
ygData.messageBody:
The battle drum comes from the named gypsy musician in mistmoore castle. a
level 40 group has a chance of beating the room she's in or getting creamed.
she also drops a lute of the gypsy princess. i have the lute but need to go
back for the drum soon. i died getting the lute around level 40 or so and
haven't gone back since. in fact i've been to mistmoore 3 times and died 3
times. hmmm now i think it may be time for revenge.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Alexis Muhly [mailto:acmuhly@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 4:02 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Greetings
>
>
> From: "Alexis Muhly" <acmuhly@...>

<snip>
>
> One Question I have is I've seen a Battle Drum mentioned on this
> list...I've never heard anyone speak of this instrument..is it made?
> dropped? what?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Kagami <Disciples of KILL>
> 12th Level Bard Karana
>
>
